title: Seldarine Drow
content:

Base Racial Speed Drow Weapon Training Fey Ancestry Superior Darkvision

Seldarine Drow is a Subrace of Drow in Baldur's Gate 3. Seldarine Drow have +1 Charisma and +2 Dexterity. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Drow are the result of an ancient schism between the elven deities Corellon Larethian and Lolth. The latter's treachery drove the drow into the Underdark, where they splintered into warring factions. Seldarine drow can be found seeking allies from all over Faerun, aiming to settle their conflict with Lolth - and each other - by any means necessary.

Seldarine Drow Traits:

Darkness: At lvl 5, Seldarine Drows learn this spell.

Base Racial Speed: The distance you can move per turn is 9 m. Fey Ancestry: The Feywild casts a veil over your mind. You have an advantage on saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep. Rapier Proficiency: Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Rapiers. Shortsword Proficiency: Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Shortswords. Hand Crossbow Proficiency: Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Hand Crossbows. Superior Darkvision: This creature can see in the dark within 24 m. Drow Spellcasting: Dancing lights: Create wisps of light that illuminate a 9m radius. Drow gain access to the Cantrip at level 1. Charisma is their spellcasting ability for this Cantrip Faerie Fire: Encase multiple targets in colorful light. The targets turns visible, and attack rolls against the targets have advantage. Ignores allies with the Sculpt Spells feature. Drow gain access to this spell at level 3. They can cast it once, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell. Darkness: Create a cloud of magical darkness to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of the darkness. Drow gain access to this spell at level 5. They can cast it once, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell.

Seldarine Drow Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Drow race, including the subrace Seldarine Drow, used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ?? ??
